scripts.generate: rm -rf ./src/generated-types && mkdir -p ./src/generated-types && abi-types-generator './src/abi/CloneFactory.json' --output='./src/generated-types' && abi-types-generator './src/abi/Lumerin.json' --output='./src/generated-types' && abi-types-generator './src/abi/Implementation.json' --output='./src/generated-types' && abi-types-generator './src/abi/Faucet.json' --output='./src/generated-types'
